CV

Experience

AI for Humanity Intern Mila, Quebec AI Institute
  • Developed a BERT-based question answering tool to help speed up analysis of financial documents relating to climate change.
 Jan 2020-July 2020
Research Assistant Montreal Computational and Quantitative Linguistics Lab (MCQLL)
  • Implemented algorithms for and tested the predictions of various models of linguistic productivity.
 Aug 2018-Aug 2020
Participant, 2019 Cohort AI4Good Summer Lab, Mila Quebec AI Institute
  • Participated in an 8-week intensive AI and ML training program for women and gender minorities.
  • Trained unsupervised LDA models to categorize climate change-related articles.
  • Analyzed article contents using word2vec and sentiment analysis, with the goal of investigating climate change coverage.
 May 2019-June 2019
Intramural Game Official McGill University Athletics
  • Facilitated and/or refereed ultimate frisbee and inner-tube water polo games.
 Sept 2016-April 2017

Awards

Award for Excellency in Research McGill Department of Linguistics Awarded for an outstanding research project and demonstrated proficiency in research skills. May 2020
Margaret Jane Allan Scholarship McGill University Faculty of Arts Awarded to the woman student with the highest academic standing after the first year of the B.A. course. Aug 2016

Education

MSc Computer Science McGill University Expected Graduation Date: May 2022
BA Linguistics Honours Major, Computer Science Minor McGill University Aug 2015-May 2020
